entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
